WRITING.TITLE: First Look and Demonstration with Guan Yu (LuBu). Surprise! OP!

WRITING.TEXT: Cool, I will posistion safer, with a mage that has 2x better ratios, better kits. Sorry I think up the builds you eventually copy.

So like a tank , I didnt die, and I had tank items. Try again, mmkay

WRITING.TITLE: Agni's True Potential Realized - "The Burning Bruiser" - Is there another initiate even close? 2s AoE Stun, that when combined with the dash out reaches almost any another ability. Oh and its not a ult like the "real" tanks initiates/shutdowns.
